General.Name: Chardan NexTech Acquisition 2 Corp
General.Description: Dragonfly Energy Holdings Corp. manufactures and supplies deep cycle lithium-ion batteries for RVs, marine vessels, off-grid installations, and other storage applications. It also focuses on delivering an energy storage solution to enable a sustainable and reliable smart grid through the deployment of its solid-state cell technology. The company is headquartered in Reno, Nevada.
General.Address: 1190 Trademark Drive, Reno, NV, United States, 89521
